languages.text: "Напротив — благословение варпа слишком возвысило меня над твоим родом, фон Валанциус. Страж отказался подчиниться... но ведь для этого же и существуют родственники, готовые помочь, не так ли?

traits.locale_text: "Напротив — благословение варпа слишком возвысило меня над твоим родом, фон Валанциус. Страж отказался подчиниться... но ведь для этого же и существуют родственники, готовые помочь, не так ли?

languages.text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"
languages.original_text: "Напротив — благословение варпа слишком возвысило меня над твоим родом, фон Валанциус. Страж отказался подчиниться... но ведь для этого же и существуют родственники, готовые помочь, не так ли?

traits.locale_text: "Only one obstacle remains — and you, {name}, will help me overcome it. The gates of the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device connected to the ship's security {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}. The accursed von Valancius have always been obsessed with blood, and so the Sentinel will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty who spills their blood into the maw of the machine. I thought I could handle this on my own... but the warp's blessing has changed me, and the change is so great that the Sentinel has refused me! But that is what family is for, is it not? To lend a helping hand..."

"Only one obstacle remains — and you, {name}, will help me overcome it. The gates of the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device connected to the ship's security {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g}. The accursed von Valancius have always been obsessed with blood, and so the Sentinel will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty who spills their blood into the maw of the machine. I thought I could handle this on my own... but the warp's blessing has changed me, and the change is so great that the Sentinel has refused me! But that is what family is for, is it not? To lend a helping hand..."
"On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but that's what relatives are there to help, isn't it?
"On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"
"On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"
"On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

languages.text: “恰恰相反，亚空间的祝福让我超越了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的凡躯肉胎，哨兵拒绝臣服于我……不过，你可以帮我这个忙。毕竟，家族成员不就是做这个用的吗？”
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

traits.locale_text: “恰恰相反，亚空间的祝福让我超越了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的凡躯肉胎，哨兵拒绝臣服于我……不过，你可以帮我这个忙。毕竟，家族成员不就是做这个用的吗？”

languages.text: «Al contrario. La bendición de la disformidad me ha elevado muy por encima de los suyos, von Valancius. El centinela se ha negado a someterse a mí... pero usted puede ayudarme. Para eso está la familia, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

traits.locale_text: «Al contrario. La bendición de la disformidad me ha elevado muy por encima de los suyos, von Valancius. El centinela se ha negado a someterse a mí... pero usted puede ayudarme. Para eso está la familia, ¿no?».

languages.text: 「それどころか逆に、<歪み>の祝福のおかげで、私はお前の一族フォン・ヴァランシウスよりもはるか高みにあがったんだ。センチネルは私に服従することを拒否したが、お前なら役に立つ…結局のところ、家族はそんな時のためにいるんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

traits.locale_text: 「ところが逆に、<歪み>の祝福のおかげで、私はお前の一族フォン・ヴァランシウスよりもはるかに上にあがったんだ。センチネルは私に服従することを拒否したが、あなたには助けることができる…結局のところ、そんな時のために家族はいるんだろう？」
「それどころか逆に、<歪み>の祝福のおかげで、私はお前の一族フォン・ヴァランシウスよりもはるか高みにあがったんだ。センチネルは私に服従することを拒否したが、お前なら役に立つ…結局のところ、家族はそんな時のためにいるんだろう？」

languages.text: « Au contraire. La bénédiction du Warp m'a hissé bien trop haut par rapport à vous autres von Valancius. La sentinelle a refusé de m'obéir... mais vous allez m'aider. C'est bien à cela que sert la famille, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

traits.locale_text: « Au contraire. La bénédiction du Warp m'a hissé bien trop haut par rapport à vous autres von Valancius. La sentinelle a refusé de m'obéir... mais vous allez m'aider. C'est bien à cela que sert la famille, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Im Gegenteil. Der Segen des Warp hat mich zu weit über Euresgleichen gestellt, von Valancius. Der Wächter hat sich geweigert, vor mir zu kapitulieren ... aber Ihr könnt helfen – dafür hat man doch Familie, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegenteil. Der Segen des Warp hat mich zu weit über Euresgleichen gestellt, von Valancius. Der Wächter hat sich geweigert, vor mir zu kapitulieren ... aber Ihr könnt helfen – dafür hat man doch Familie, nicht wahr?"

languages.original_text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

languages.text: "Aksine. Öteboyut'un kutsaması beni sizin gibilerin çok üstüne çıkardı von Valancius. Nöbetçi bana boyun eğmeyi reddediyor... Ama sen yardım edebilirsin. Ne de olsa aile bunun için var, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "On the contrary. The warp's blessing has raised me too much above your kind, von Valancius. The Sentinel refused to submit to me... but you can help — after all, isn't that what family is for?"

traits.locale_text: "Aksine. Öteboyut'un kutsaması beni sizin gibilerin çok üstüne çıkardı von Valancius. Nöbetçi bana boyun eğmeyi reddediyor... Ama sen yardım edebilirsin. Ne de olsa aile bunun için var, değil mi?"
